page.title: 09SEDDON ESTATE, CHELFORD cont
page.content: Noise is not a problem from either the building of the estate or the railway station but the estate has some aircraft noise as it is under the flight path for Manchester airport. Quite a few people would like to see more shops and lesuire facilities convenient. Most people found the travelling convenient because they expect to use their cars and are close to the motorway. Suggestions for three improvements brought many individual ideas. The main ones were to move the flight path of the aircraft, more shops with perhaps a supermarket, a nearby school and a post office on the estate. Most people said their were no disadvantages to living on the estate although a few people mentioned you did need to have a car. The response to our survey was about 1 in 10.
